name: Voucher Redeemption Report
query:
select s.customer as "Customer Name::150",c.phone_no as "Contact No",c.email_id as "Email ID::150",s.discount_amount as  "Value Of Voucher::150",s.creation as "Voucher Redemption Date::150" ,pr.creation as "Voucher Creation Date::150",s.expiry_date as "Voucher Expiry::150",
coalesce(date_add(pr.creation,interval (select value from tabSingles where field='no_of_days') day) ,'')as "PIN Expiry::150",
(case when s.mark_voucher_as_redeemed=1 then 'redeemed' else case  when date(now())<s.expiry_date then 'Pending' else 'expired' end end)  as "Voucher Status::150"
 from `tabSlot Cashier` s,tabCustomer c,`tabPurchase Receipt` pr where s.customer=c.name and pr.pin=s.enter_pin
